channel.title: Comments on: Andy Taylor reveals why he quit Duran Duran twice in autobiography

item.title: By: sal rinella
item.dc:creator: sal rinella
item.description: Andy Taylor is AMAZING and I would love to have someone like back on the charts. I would also love to have him produce me and give me a great Midas touch as he does.
item.content:encoded:
Andy Taylor is AMAZING and I would love to have someone like back on the charts.
I would also love to have him produce me and give me a great Midas touch as he does.
